data.text:
EN

Prague Rugby Sevens

Prague Sevens is an annual event, part of the European Series Rugby Sevens. Rugby teams gather in July or Juny to enjoy a rugby 7s tournament with an unforgettable atmosphere.

For further information, please visit www.praguerugbysevens.com

About Rugby Club Tatra Smíchov

Rugby Club Tatra Smíchov belongs to the best known names in the Czech rugby. It’s a club with a rich history – established in 1958. We are the biggest rugby club in the Czech Republic. We cover all categories, starting with mini U6 through juniors, women, men elite and veterans.

We are keen to inspire our community through rugby. We have over:

The main VALUES of the Rugby Club Tatra Smíchov are:

honour

respect

integrity

passion

discipline

We have developed and implemented a continuous programme of talent identification and training development to maximise our players‘ potential. Our efforts resulted in overwhelming achievements in the past 15 years.

THE GREATEST SUCCESSES OF THE CLUB

We have been crowned the Men’s XV Czech Champions in 1995, 1997, 2003, 2007, 2008, 2013, 2018. We have reached 6 finals and won 3 titles in the last 10 years. In 2007, 2008 and 2009 our men 7s team, women, women U19, cadettes and juniors achieved a series of successes while winning their categories. Our players are core members of the Czech National Rugby teams.

We host, support and organize international rugby events

New Zealand XV Ambassadors – an annual event

A team of Kiwis who currently plays rugby in the United Kingdom and Europe.

NZAs play an annual match against the Czech national team.

Prague Youth Rugby Festival

held twice a year in Prague and its surroundings

A 2 days festival for rugby clubs from across Europe.

In 2018 over 1 500 children came to Prague to enjoy the game of rugby, have fun, create new friendships and have unforgettable memories.

Contacts

Club President: Roman Rygl

General Secretary: Bc. Petra Vacková: email sekretariat@rugbytatra.com, mobile +420 733 691 749

map: Google Map – Rugby Club Tatra Smíchov

Bonjour à vous, amis Français et autres francophones,

Je vous souhaite la bienvenue sur le site du RC TATRA, le club le plus prolifique de République tchèque. Les résultats parlent d’eux-mêmes…

Nous sommes également la plus importante école de rugby ici et accueillons plusieurs joueurs etrangers dans nos rangs. Nous défendons les valeurs traditionnelles du rugby et insistons sur l’aspect familial de notre beau sport. Venez vérifier par vous-mêmes!

En tant que référent pour la communauté francophone, je reste à votre disposition pour vous aider et vous orienter si vous décidez de nous rejoindre. N’hésitez pas à me joindre.

Daniel Kopecký | tel. +420 732 737 037, DKpy9730@gmail.com

RC Tatra Smíchov colours are

Black and white
